title: Horror Stingers and Soundscapes
description: 15 stingers and 12 soundscapes for your horror, mystery, and surrealist games.
longDescription:
A combination of soundscapes and stingers for your horror, mystery, and surrealist needs. Includes a variety of different feels including retro synthwave, lo-fi aesthetics.


Stingers

Soundscapes 1

Soundscapes 2


15 high-quality stingers ready for your horror, thriller, or just plain creepy games. A variety of sounds with different feels appropriate from everything from jumpscares to discoveries of existential dread.


12 Soundscapes:

"Droning Chants" - 2:03

"Drunk Machine" - 2:32

"Haunted Chiptune" - 2:01

"Ill Wind" - 1:16

"Late Night VHS" - 2:15

"Screams from the Darkness" - 2:22

"Sinister Threads" - 2:48

"Synthwave Drones" - 2:22

"The Ritual" - 2:21

"Trembling Glass" - 2:00

"Ugly Music Box" - 2:33

"War Drums" - 2:22
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  15 high-quality stingers in both stereo and mono formats
  •  12 soundscapes / ambiences as seamless loops
  • Cue files for all WAV files, and three examples of hybrid soundscapes

Number of Audio Waves: 42

Number of Audio Cues: 45

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs (with Mono options for Stingers)

Do Sound FX loop: Soundscape files are seamless loops

Minutes of audio provided: Over 30 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


Image: Hieronymus Bosch In the Garden of Earthly Delights (Public Domain)
